DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate exercise added usual treatment improve cocaine dependence treatment . The primary objective study investigate exercise facilitate cocaine crave reduction . The secondary aim evaluate exercise reduce negative mood state , improve quality life facilitate abstinence cocaine .
DOC.brief_title: Exercise Adjunctive Treatment Cocaine Dependent Patients
DOC.detailed_description: This study design two-groups , randomize control trial evaluate effectiveness 8-week exercise program add usual treatment compare health education program 20 cocaine dependent patient . These participant randomize one follow two group : ) exercise group : supervise moderate-vigorous exercise group base strength calisthenics exercise , b ) control group : supervise health education group . All participant must DSM-IV diagnosis cocaine dependence primary disorder must treatment .
DOC.criteria: DSMIV diagnosis cocaine dependence primary disorder age 18 60 year current psychosocial cocaine treatment medical problem contraindicate participation exercise program family history sudden death and/or early death due cardiovascular reason current inclusion regular exercise program
